attributes.action: Ban people from introducing legislation that undermine a persons rights
attributes.additional_details: Hatespeech, discrimination and prejudice are way to common in modern day britain. We must not allow this to continue. We call ourselves civilised but turn a blind eye to these issues. Under no circumstances can these people be allowed to succeed in their hateful ideology.
attributes.background: In the past, people have attempted creating petitions or introducting legislastion that put an end to equal rights such as gay marriage, equal pay & employment rights etc. We the undersigned, are calling for the government to criminalise attempting to reduce/take away a persons rights.

rejection.details:
You could start a new petition calling for a specific change to the rules for petitions. You can find out about the rules here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/help
